q1: Brazil is not playing the fun offensive style they used to play, aren't they?
a1: It may not be an offensive style, but I still have fun watching them.
a2: I think so; Brazil has some good players.
q3: do they have what it takes to win a World cup?
a3: in which phase was the Brazilian team eliminated in the last World Cup?

a4: Favourites to win the 2018 World Cup
a5: I do not agree with this
